list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: Add Post and Comment models to blog app
- Created Post model with fields for author, title, text, create_date, and optional published_date. - Added `publish` method to set published_date and save the post. - Defined `approve_comments` method to filter for approved comments. - Implemented `get_absolute_url` in Post to direct users to post_detail view after creation.
- Created Comment model with fields for post, author, text, create_date, and approved_comments. - Added `approve` method to set comment approval status. - Implemented `get_absolute_url` in Comment to redirect to post_list view after comment creation.
This setup links comments to specific posts, enables publishing and approving posts/comments, and configures URL redirects upon creation.

component.name: DjangoConsoleOptions

option.name: myCustomStartScript

task.summary: Settings up django project for blog

feat: Add Post and Comment models to blog app
- Created Post model with fields for author, title, text, create_date, and optional published_date. - Added `publish` method to set published_date and save the post. - Defined `approve_comments` method to filter for approved comments. - Implemented `get_absolute_url` in Post to direct users to post_detail view after creation.
- Created Comment model with fields for post, author, text, create_date, and approved_comments. - Added `approve` method to set comment approval status. - Implemented `get_absolute_url` in Comment to redirect to post_list view after comment creation.
This setup links comments to specific posts, enables publishing and approving posts/comments, and configures URL redirects upon creation.
